ygData.subject: Re: Request for advice
ygData.msgSnippet: It is true, the only faction loss that you receive from killing either the bandits or the sister in Lesser Fay is a faction loss with the Dervishes of Northern
ygData.messageBody:
It is true, the only faction loss that you receive from killing either the
bandits or the sister in Lesser Fay is a faction loss with the Dervishes
of Northern Ro. So kill away. Even the bandit camp in Greater Fay does
not yield any faction loss. Though being a woodelf myself it is
disconcerting to receive Wood Elf bits as loot from a bandit.

Treilanin - Bard of the 16th Verse - Karana


On Fri, 14 May 1999, jay schultze wrote:

> From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
> >Im a Wood Elf and my roommate plays a Highelf...can we kill the bandits
> >without lowering our faction with our hometowns?
>
> The bandits he was referring to in Lesser Faydark are Half-elves, and during
> beta GM's stated there was no faction loss (and that definitely seemed to be
> the case) for High Elves. I don't know if any of that's changed since
> commercial started, but I doubt it.
>
> I also heard that there is a faction loss in regards to dervishes (Desert of
> Ro) when you hunt the lesser fay bandits, but I don't know if that's true.
>
> Sartori of Kelethin
>
